Figes' view is basically unsustainable when you actually compare the 5th ed with the excluded documents. It's an eccentric opinion.
ideologic - ideological. Briefly, its seems like Trotsky has an opinon of 5th ed of PSS which were published after his death
We cannot accept the popular journalism of Figes alone as representative of the genearl academic opinio on this question.
Inaccuracy - Mensheviks got narrow majority in debate over party membership as they were backed by Bund and Economist delegates. Only when these latter walked out did the Bolsheviks obtain a majority
